verblex: 1. To move your hand slowly and gently over someone or something. English = stroke.
2. Of animals and birds, to be unafraid of people and able to be touched. English = (be) tame.
3. To train an animal or a bird to be unafraid of people and to able to be touched. English = tame.
nomlex: 1. A type of touch where you move your hand slowly and gently over someone or something. English = stroke.
